About.Name: AmirMohammad Mirzaei
About.Des1: AmirMohammad Mirzaei was born in 2004 in Torbat-e Heydarieh and studying network and computer software.
About.Des2: From the age of 15, I have started seriously in the field of programming.
About.Des3: Gain second rank in the design trend in thirty ninth cultural and artistic festivals tomorrow.
